abstract: In October, Meredith Whitney, a banking analyst then at CIBC World Markets, endured jeers when she boldly predicted slashed dividends at Citigroup. But in mid-January, when Citi announced $18 billion in fourth quarter write-downs-including a 41 percent dividend cut, she — now at Oppenheimer — was vindicated.
